references.paper_title: Blind image deconvolution using deep generative priors
references.reason: This paper is foundational for self-supervised BID, introducing the concept of using deep generative priors to regularize the training process.

references.paper_title: Blind super-resolution kernel estimation using an internal-gan
references.reason: This work demonstrates a novel approach to estimating blur kernels using generative adversarial networks, a technique crucial for self-supervised BID.

references.paper_title: Self-supervised blind image deconvolution via deep generative ensemble learning
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it proposes a self-supervised method for BID leveraging deep generative models, similar to the approach presented in the main paper.
The Deep Image Prior is a fundamental concept for self-supervised BID, providing an implicit prior for image structure during training, which is a key component of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Single image defocus deblurring via implicit neural inverse kernels
references.reason: This paper is among the most important as it introduces the use of implicit neural representations (INRs) for representing both latent images and kernels, which is a core component of the proposed methodology.
